name: Excel Charts and Pivot Tables
subtitle: Excel Charts and Pivot Tables
description: Can you create a chart from the Excel data for our report? Can you make a dashboard? Oh, we also need a pivot table.  These are requests that can make Excel users quiver in fear.  In this series, we simplify how to create charts, PivotTables, and PivotCharts. We start from the beginning with identifying terminology used with charts and advance to creating complex PivotTables and PivotCharts.
descriptionMD: Can you create a chart from the Excel data for our report? Can you make a dashboard? Oh, we also need a pivot table.  These are requests that can make Excel users quiver in fear.  In this series, we simplify how to create charts, PivotTables, and PivotCharts. We start from the beginning with identifying terminology used with charts and advance to creating complex PivotTables and PivotCharts.

episodes.title: Introduction to Charts
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne kick off the Excel Charts and Pivot tables series by building your foundational knowledge in regards to Charts. Here they will identify the parts of a Chart, define terms used, and look at the contextual tabs you'll use when working with Charts.

episodes.title: Insert and Format Basic Charts
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne continue with their series on Charts and Pivot Tables in Excel 2016. Here they work more with Charts, this time showing you how to insert a basic Chart. They also demonstrate selecting data for the chart, quick layouts, Chart styles, adding elements, formatting, and quick buttons.

episodes.title: Create Charts from Noncontiguous Data
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne demonstrate how you can create a Chart from disconnected or noncontiguous data. Here they will walk you through the steps needed to select and connect the noncontiguous data you want to use to create a chart.

episodes.title: Create a Pie Chart
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne explain and show you how to create a pie chart in Excel. Specific topics covered here includes: labels, number formats, styles, series options, donut pie, pie in pie, sort sheet, format data series, data label options, and second plot size.

episodes.title: Sparklines and Timelines
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne explore working with Sparklines and Timelines in Excel 2016. Here you will see how to enable and use Sparklines to quickly see graphical data for data in a worksheet, insert Timelines to chart the history of a data-set, and use Slicers to quickly modify edit the viewed data.

episodes.title: Filled Map Charts
episodes.description: Vonne and Zach talk about selected data in Design tab, add/modify chart elements, Styles, format data series, map projection, moving chart & adding labels, examples of Geo data, format series, adding data labels, and the need to consolidate data first.

episodes.title: Create a Basic Pivot Table
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne explore and explain the use and function of Pivot Tables. Here they will define what a Pivot Table is, when/where/why they're used, available options when using them, and deleting them when necessary.

episodes.title: Create a Basic Pivot Chart
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne demonstrate how to create a basic Pivot Chart in Excel 2016. Here you'll see how to insert a Pivot Chart from a Pivot Table, look at series vs.categories, adding data labels, chart/table filters, changing source data, multiple charts, using the slicer, moving charts to separate sheets, and deleting tables.
